title: Mario Falcone thanks Mark Wright for seeing his ex Lucy Mecklenburgh
text:
She admitted to cheating on him with their co-star during an emotional showdown on TOWIE in 2011 after denying it for two months.

And Mario Falcone decided to throw some serious shade at his ex Lucy Mecklenburgh on Tuesday as he claimed that Mark Wright did him a 'massive favour' by spending the night with her in 2011.

The TOWIE star, 31, revealed that despite their past drama, he's proud of the presenter's, 32, achievements and has even congratulated the star on his milestones.

Shade: Mario Falcone decided to throw some serious shade at his ex Lucy Mecklenburgh on Tuesday as he claimed that Mark Wright did him a 'massive favour' by spending the night with her in 2011 (Mario and Lucy pictured in 2012)

Talking to New! Magazine, Mario said: 'Anything to do with his work or marriage, I've messaged him to say congratulations. He's done so well.

'Everything happens for a reason and, at the end of the day, he did me a massive favour.'

MailOnline has contacted Lucy's representative for comment.

In 2011, Mark had told Mario that he had hooked up with Lucy while he was holidaying in Ibiza, with the brunette beauty denying the claims for two months before eventually admitting that she had cheated in an emotional showdown on TOWIE.

What drama? The TOWIE star, 31, revealed that despite their past drama, he's proud of the presenter's, 32, achievements and has even congratulated the star on his milestones (Mark and Lucy pictured on TOWIE in 2010)

A fuming Mario swiftly broke up with her and yelled at the time: 'You lied for the last two months not just to me, to my whole family.

'What sort of person does that make you? How can you say anything? There is nothing more to say!'

The week before, Mark's older sister Jessica showed James 'Arg' Argent and Gemma Collins a text message from Lucy asking her to cover for her on the night of the impromptu sleepover.

Showdown: In 2011, Mark had told Mario that he had hooked up with Lucy while he was holidaying in Ibiza, with the brunette beauty denying the claims for two months before eventually admitting that she had cheated in an emotional showdown on TOWIE (pictured)

Exes: Lucy and Mario started dating in April 2011, with the bespoke tailor making his debut on the third series of TOWIE in September (pictured in 2012)

Lucy and Mario started dating in April 2011, with the bespoke tailor making his debut on the third series of TOWIE in September.

Just weeks into their relationship, it was rocked when Lucy and Mark shared a kiss on holiday in Marbella.

But as the couple weren't 'serious' at the time, Mario let it slide, yet when he discovered Mark and Lucy spent yet a night together months later, he wasn't so forgiving.

Yet the couple eventually rekindled their romance and even got engaged before calling it off for good in 2012.

Fatherhood: Mario is now loved-up with fiancée Becky Miesner and they welcomed a son together, Parker Jax, in November 2018

Mother-to-be: While Lucy is currently expecting her first child with fiancé Ryan Thomas after meeting on Celebrity Island with Bear Grylls in 2017

Mario is now loved-up with fiancée Becky Miesner and they welcomed a son together, Parker Jax, in November 2018.

While Lucy is currently expecting her first child with fiancé Ryan Thomas after meeting on Celebrity Island with Bear Grylls in 2017.

Mark has also moved on from his past TOWIE love drama and is smitten with his wife Michelle Keegan after tying the knot in 2015.
